taskDescription: Nitroethylene, H2C ═ \text{═}CHNO2, is a sensitive compound that must be prepared with great care. Attempted purification of nitroethylene by distillation often results in low recovery of product and a white coating on the inner walls of the distillation apparatus. Explain.
